testcase.name: To validate that user should logout
testcase.system-out: Given User in on the home page..............................................passed When user enter username....................................................passed And user enters password....................................................passed And user clicks on login button.............................................passed Then user logged in successfully and user should able to logout from website.passed

testcase.name: To validate user should able to view or change item in cart
testcase.system-out: Given User in on the home page..............................................passed When user click on search bar...............................................passed And user give some product name.............................................passed And user add item in cart...................................................passed Then user visit the cart and view or change product quantity for purchasing.passed

testcase.name: To validate that user should able to add any product to cart
testcase.system-out: Given User in on the home page..............................................passed When user click on search bar...............................................passed And user give some product name.............................................passed Then user choose the product and add to the cart............................passed

testcase.name: To validate that user should able to buy product directly without adding in cart
testcase.system-out: Given User in on the home page..............................................passed When user click on search bar...............................................passed And user give some product name.............................................passed Then user choose the product and click buy now for direct purchasing........passed

testcase.name: To validate that user should buy a product from his cart
To validate that user should login with correct credentials
To validate that user should not login with Incorrect credentials
testcase.system-out: Given User in on the home page..............................................passed When user enter wrong username..............................................passed Then user is shown a error message..........................................passed

testcase.name: To validate that user should search for a product
testcase.system-out: Given User in on the home page..............................................passed When user click on search bar...............................................passed And user give some product name.............................................passed Then results will come up on the screen.....................................passed

testcase.name: To validate that user should get error for wrong product search
testcase.system-out: Given User in on the home page..............................................passed When user enter wrong product name..........................................passed Then user should get error message..........................................passed
